mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) advertising the Jones Family. Notes are written on the poster in pen. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Jones Family. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41687/
